title: How to Make a Dutch Boy Pan Cake

steps.headline: Coat the insides of a 9 pie pan with all of the butter.
Combine all of the rest of the ingredients.
steps.description: If using a blender or mixer, blend on low speed for about three minutes. If doing it by hand, mix it thoroughly and longer.

steps.headline: Pour the batter into the pie pan.
Bake for 20 minutes at 450 and then reduce the oven to 350 and bake for 10 more minutes.
Remove the Pancake carefully with a potholder and spatula.
Cut the Pancake in half, placing each half on its own plate.
Choose a topping to go on it.

text: Preheat your oven to 450 °F (232 °C).  Coat the insides of a 9 pie pan with all of the butter.  Combine all of the rest of the ingredients. If using a blender or mixer, blend on low speed for about three minutes. If doing it by hand, mix it thoroughly and longer. Pour the batter into the pie pan.  Bake for 20 minutes at 450 and then reduce the oven to 350 and bake for 10 more minutes.  Remove the Pancake carefully with a potholder and spatula.  Cut the Pancake in half, placing each half on its own plate.  Choose a topping to go on it.
